content:
A suspension of 75 mg (0.2 mmol) of Al­(NO3)3·9H2O and 53.6 mg (0.2 mmol) of H2SDC in 10 mL of DMF was transferred to a 23 mL Teflon-lined reactor. The slurry was heated at 190 °C for 72 h and cooled down to room temperature in 6 h. The white solid was washed with DMF (3 × 10 mL), collected by centrifugation (10 min/3500 rpm), and dried at room temperature. The as-synthetized material was further washed to remove the potential unreacted ligand, which could be trapped inside the cavities. Thus, the corresponding solid was suspended in DMF (5 mg/mL), heated in a microwave-assisted reactor (50 °C, 15 min), and collected by centrifugation (10 min/3500 rpm). This process was done in triplicate. Anal. Calcd for CYCU-3 20_0 [Al­(OH)­(C16O4H10)]­(H2O)1.1(C3H7NO)0.1: N, 0.42; C, 58.03; H, 4.15. Found: N, 0.39; C, 60.11; H, 4.24. Residue (Al2O3) (calc./exp.): 16.13/15.88%.

Scale-up Synthesis of CYCU-3 50_5

The material CYCU-3 50_5 was prepared and isolated following the same procedure as that for CYCU-3 20_0. In this case, a suspension of 187.6 mg (0.5 mmol) of Al­(NO3)3·9H2O and 134.1 mg (0.5 mmol) of H2SDC in 9.86 mL of DMF was mixed with 0.14 mL (2.5 mmol) of acetic acid. Anal. Calcd for CYCU-3 50_5 [Al­(OH)­(C16O4H10)0.75(CH3COO)0.5]­(H2O)1.5(C3H7NO)0.18: N, 0.80; C, 51.89; H, 4.59. Found: N, 0.77; C, 51.31; H, 4.35. Residue (Al2O3) (calc./exp.): 16.27/18.22%.

Scale-up Synthesis of CYCU-3′ 50_50

The material CYCU-3′ 50_50 was prepared and isolated following the same procedure as that for CYCU-3 20_0. In this case, a suspension of 187.6 mg (0.5 mmol) of Al­(NO3)3·9H2O and 134.1 mg (0.5 mmol) of H2SDC in 8.6 mL of DMF was mixed with 1.4 mL (25 mmol) of acetic acid. Anal. Calcd for CYCU-3′ 50_50 [Al­(OH)­(C16O4H10)0.55(CH3COO)0.9]­(C3H7NO)0.04: N, 0.23; C, 52.23; H, 3.88. Found: N, 0.29; C, 52.73; H, 3.58. Residue (Al2O3) (calc./exp.): 20.68/22.10%.

Scale-up Synthesis of CYCU-3 20_0

A suspension of 75 mg (0.2 mmol) of Al(NO3)3⋅9H2O and 53.6 mg (0.2 mmol) of H2SDC in 10 mL of DMF was transferred to a 23 mL Teflon-lined reactor. The slurry was heated at 190 °C for 72 h and cooled down to room temperature in 6 h. The white solid was washed with DMF (3 × 10 mL), collected by centrifugation (10 min/3500 rpm), and dried at room temperature. The as-synthetized material was further washed to remove the potential unreacted ligand, which could be trapped inside the cavities. Thus, the corresponding solid was suspended in DMF (5 mg/mL), heated in a microwave-assisted reactor (50 °C, 15 min), and collected by centrifugation (10 min/3500 rpm). This process was done in triplicate. Anal. Calcd for CYCU-3 20_0 [Al(OH)(C16O4H10)](H2O)1.1(C3H7NO)0.1: N, 0.42; C, 58.03; H, 4.15. Found: N, 0.39; C, 60.11; H, 4.24. Residue (Al2O3) (calc./exp.): 16.13/15.88%.

Scale-up Synthesis of CYCU-3 50_5

The material CYCU-3 50_5 was prepared and isolated following the same procedure as that for CYCU-3 20_0. In this case, a suspension of 187.6 mg (0.5 mmol) of Al(NO3)3⋅9H2O and 134.1 mg (0.5 mmol) of H2SDC in 9.86 mL of DMF was mixed with 0.14 mL (2.5 mmol) of acetic acid. Anal. Calcd for CYCU-3 50_5 [Al(OH)(C16O4H10)0.75(CH3COO)0.5](H2O)1.5(C3H7NO)0.18: N, 0.80; C, 51.89; H, 4.59. Found: N, 0.77; C, 51.31; H, 4.35. Residue (Al2O3) (calc./exp.): 16.27/18.22%.

Scale-up Synthesis of CYCU-3' 50_50

The material CYCU-3' 50_50 was prepared and isolated following the same procedure as that for CYCU-3 20_0. In this case, a suspension of 187.6 mg (0.5 mmol) of Al(NO3)3⋅9H2O and 134.1 mg (0.5 mmol) of H2SDC in 8.6 mL of DMF was mixed with 1.4 mL (25 mmol) of acetic acid. Anal. Calcd for CYCU-3' 50_50 [Al(OH)(C16O4H10)0.55(CH3COO)0.9](C3H7NO)0.04: N, 0.23; C, 52.23; H, 3.88. Found: N, 0.29; C, 52.73; H, 3.58. Residue (Al2O3) (calc./exp.): 20.68/22.10%.
